headline: Invitation Homes to Host Investor & Analyst Day
summary: DALLAS, November 11, 2025--Invitation Homes Inc. (NYSE: INVH) ("Invitation Homes," the "Company," or "our"), the nation’s premier single-family home leasing and management company, today announced additional details regarding its upcoming Investor & Analyst Day, which will be held on Monday, November 17, 2025. The event will feature presentations from senior leadership covering the Company’s operating environment, near- and long-term growth strategies, innovation and efficiency initiatives, and
